page.name: Desert Thug Camp
page.description: You wandered into a camp of desert thugs! Time to clear it out!

properties.name: Desert Thug Camp
properties.description: You wandered into a camp of desert thugs! Time to clear it out!
properties.complete: They've certainly been busy. It's called the Sandsea but all the boats are a bit much.
